extendedInfo.description: The Builders Cost Tracker app allows the user to set up a list of various job titles and then allocate expenses to each job as they occur. At the top of each page the estimated cost and time allowed for each job can be inserted.A running tally of the actual amount of money and time spent for each job is also provided at the bottom of each page.This app is handy for any builder or construction manager who is on the run and wants to record costs as well as keep track of time and money spent on each project.

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Simple but effective. Very easy to use . Good value for money.
reviews.author: Ian P

reviews.title: A must for tradesmen
reviews.comment: Great for keeping an eye on your project costings when you are away from your desk a simple app that will help you keep an eye on costs.
reviews.author: Tom Holmes

reviews.title: Simple and Helpful
reviews.comment: Thanks, really easy way to record spendings on projects
reviews.author: Jordan Fitzgerald
